reviews.text: We had a family wedding to attend in Memphis and I rolled my eyes as my husband proclaimed that his dad had a coupon for free rooms as the Gold Strike! Staying at a casino was not my first idea. I was pleasantly surprised.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
Wonderful place to vacation, beautiful hotel,casino and staff.
reviews.text: The rooms were extremely modern, clean, and well appointed. When we arrived there was no soap in the bathroom and only 2 towels. I called down to housekeeping and no more than 3 minutes passed before someone was at our door with the towels and soap AND apologizing that these items were overlooked.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room had a great view of the Mississippi River.
reviews.title: GoldStrike Always Wins!

reviews.text: The only downside is that there isn't anything else within walking distance but the casino (which isn't my thing) and you have to walk through the smoky casino to get to the buffet.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel - Casino Very Tight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this only if someone was looking for a good casnio/hotel in Tunica but not for a vacation to Memphis or the area.
reviews.title: Nice rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed there several times and the stay is always very enjoyable. It's the only hotel we stay at anymore, and we have have stayed at just about all of them in Tunica. We always upgrade to a suite and it's well worth it. The staff, dealers, pit bosses, etc are always very nice and go out of their way to help in any way. The buffet is not the best in Tunica but very good. The casino is located right next to 2 other ones so if you want to try another casino you can walk and not have to drive. Plenty of slots and table games. I would stay away from the weekends if you can, really busy.
reviews.title: A beautiful hotel,and you won't be disappointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a little snafu with checkin, arrived 3:30, checkin is 4:00, had a small problem locating our reservation, however we were warmly rewarded with free Buffets. The staff was always smiling and friendly. Let me say the buffet was great for breakfast & dinner. Prices for buffet and the Cafe were very reasonable. Sunday buffet was brunch with champane and all the rest. We have stayed at the best including Belagio and the casino was great and in keeping with the size of the hotel. For those who want less noise and less smokers try the 2nd floor slots and poker tournament. The room was spacious and comfortable with large flat screen tv and very quiet. The pool was small, but when comparing with three other casinos was par and had 2 hot tubs. We visited Roadhouse, Bally's and Fitz did not have any desire to go to gamble. Harrahs seemed would be a challenge if staying there because how everything is spread out.
reviews.title: Absolutely the greatest (in Tunica)!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place reminded me of the Picadilly, old people and smokers everywhere. I think i need to get a couple new lungs after a weekend at the goldstrike. The pool sucks too. It's about the size of a large bathtub. Rooms were so so, LOUD people stayed next to us.....The Chicago steakhouse in the goldstrike was good....Probably staying at the Horseshoe next time.
reviews.title: Not that Great

reviews.text: Stayed at Gold Strike for a comped overnight on June 5. I was able to check-in shortly after Noon with no waiting, no problem. I checked out early the next morning and it was just as pleasant and easy. The room was on the 7th floor and I could see the lights of the neighboring casinos. It was clean, of standard size; and had a coffee pot in the room which is not the norm when you stay most casino hotels. Although there were no towels when I arrived in the room, housekeeping was on the floor prepping other rooms and gave me an armful with a smile. Gambled for hours until dinner; arriving early more slots were open. Had small wins which kept me going until dinner at the Chicago Steakhouse. After dinner it was a bit difficult to get to favorite slots; the casino gets very crowded in the evenings.
reviews.title: Always a solid gold hit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dinner was enjoyable. You can go casually or chicly dressed and feel comfortable either way. The menu is solid; the pricing fair for the items offered with the portions large. They have a nicely balanced wine menu. The wait staff is pleasant, timing when they come to check on re-fills, next course, etc. without being obnoxious.
reviews.title: The worst service imaginable.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful and way-too-short stay here May 27-28. Were greeted at checkin with an even lower rate than when we booked the room. Found the room to be very spacious with 2 complimentary bottles of water, which you need after the Mississippi heat. Swimming pool was small and one of the two hot tubs was not much warmer than a nice bath. Buffet was good with many selections. Casino had good airflow and even though there was smoking going on, it did not linger and become a cloud over and around you.
reviews.title: You can't go wrong here

reviews.text: Room ws very nice. Desk clerks nice. Players club lady was unfriendly. I wished I would have had the other lady because she was very nice to the people she was waiting on. Casino was hot temperature wise. I don't mind spending money but being uncomfortable sucks. Walked to Horseshoe and casino was roomier and cooler. Walked to Roadhouse and it was hot there too and smelled like urine and beer. Karioke was so loud and awful I couldn't even hear my machine.
reviews.title: Gold Stike Hotel and Casino

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Goldstirke for my 40th birthday weekend. The rooms were large,clean, and very comfortable. The staff were friendly and helpful. The buffet was very good.
reviews.title: nice hotel,friendly staff

reviews.text: The downside: The pool was laughable it was so tiny. If thats the best that they could do they should'nt have even bothered to have a pool. It was work to get a drink in the casino. There were very few waitresses and it was 25-30 min. to get a drink.
reviews.title: Gold Strike really is a golden hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall I did enjoy my stay and would probably stay there again, the good outweighed the bad.
reviews.title: Excellent stay!!

reviews.text: Excellent hotel. Great accomodation at a bargain rates Sundays - Thursdays. Weekends can be very busy and costly too. Memphis Airport and downtown are only a half hour drive away straight down Highway 61. Good casino here and restaurants too. A vehicle is essential to get the most from your stay here. When staying in Tunica you must visit the Tunica river park. Clarksdale is only another drive away, as is Little Rock and Helena-West Helena across the bridge on Highway 49 down in Arkansas.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel for Memphis and Mississippi at bargain rates Sun-Thur

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I accepted the invitation from the Gold Strike for the free air fare and hotel room for three nights and we have never been treated so well from any hotel. The great service began right at the airport and continued right up until we got in our car to drive home. The hotel and the staff is outstanding. If you get a chance to go to Tunica, definitely stay at the Gold Strike and be treated like a queen or king during your stay. We will be going back. Thanks Gold Strike for a great time!!
reviews.title: Accepted the Free Invite and Was Treated Like a Queen!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Gold Strike hotel and casino were excellent. Met friends from AL, and our
reviews.title: EXCELLENT

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: first stay in Tunica. Would HIGHLY RECOMMEND the Gold Strike.
reviews.title: Great time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff was wonderful, clean and excellent location.
reviews.title: Lock everything in the safe, even your bottle of perfume!
